title: Golden Gate National Recreation Area: Projects and Planning
body: Projects and Planning Image Gallery        A ranger stands in a fissure near Stinson Beach created by winter storms. Golden Gate NRA, Park Archives, Stinson Beach Photograph Collection, GOGA-3210       Keeping a large and diverse national park running takes a tremendous amount of work! In this gallery, explore images of projects and planning activities like restoration work of natural landscapes and the construction and repair of buildings and infrastructure for visitor use, including accessibility features.     Images within these albums may be used for any legitimate non-commercial public or press use with proper credit given to the National Park Service. If you have any questions or additional information on the historic images, please contact the Park Archives and Records Center’s reference archivist at 415-561-2807 or e-mail us. For information about the contemporary images please contact the Public Affairs Office.                   Projects - Fort Baker Construction   17 Photos            Projects - Banducci Restoration   9 Photos            Projects - Cool Globes   4 Photos  Students from the Academy of Art University were challenged to produce advertisements about Global Climate Change during the Spring 2008. The assignment required the designers to feature a positive message on what people can do to make an environment choice.            Alcatraz - Accessibility   6 Photos            Fort Mason - Accessibility   8 Photos  Images of Fort Mason's accessible features.          Fort Point - Accessibility   8 Photos  Images of Fort Point's accessible features.            Muir Woods - Accessibility   8 Photos            Ocean Beach- Accessibility   5 Photos            Projects - Mori Point   10 Photos  Endangered reptile and amphibian restoration above Pacifica            Projects - Coastal Clean-up Day   15 Photos  Photo gallery of the Coastal Cleanup Day at Ocean Beach (Saturday, September 20, 2008) where thousands of volunteers came to help clean the beaches in the Golden Gate National Recreation Area.          Projects - Historical   8 Photos  Images of projects from the Park's past
